title: Al Wehda FC - Wikipedia
snippet: Al-Wehda FC (Arabic: نادي الوحدة لكرة القدم, romanized: Nādī al-Waḥdah li-kurat al-qadam, lit. 'Unity Football Club') is a multi-sports club based in Mecca, Saudi Arabia. Al-Wehda is the 5th oldest club in Saudi Arabia, founded in 1945, but if the club's establishment ...

title: Al Wahda FC - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1984, Abu Dhabi SC and Al-Emirates SC merged to create Al-Wahda FC.

title: [:ar]شركة الوحدة لكرة القدم[:en]Al Wahda Football Company[:] - AlWahda SC
snippet: Al Wahda Football Company Under the directives of H.H. Sheikh Theyab bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Al Wahda Football Company was founded in 2013. The Football Company aims to improve the football sport and creating a team that competes on all levels ...

title: Al Wahda Investment | LinkedIn
snippet: Al Wahda Investment is an investment group based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. It is responsible for managing all assets owned by Al Wahda Sports Cultural Club holding company and pursuing new investment opportunities.
